message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire [Product Name/Description], a product I value at no less than $1500000. I believe it has the potential to be incredibly valuable for someone like you, given your expertise in [Mention Bob's field/expertise]. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This is a price I'm confident is fair, considering the product's potential.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
